item.description:
Its supposed to be in the 70's, its the start of a long weekend and we LOVE Ice Cream, so.............

Lets go out and meet at Richardson's for a fun summer night.  We can play a round of mini golf, see some cows and watch out for those flying pigs, putt or Batt some balls whichever you enjoy the most.

Meet at the entrance to mini golf and we will take the night from there.

Remember, if you are running late, can't find us or have to cancel at the last minute...please call the meetup phone at 978-304-2811.

If you haven't paid your dues this year, please be prepared to pay at this event.

 

HOpe to see you all at the Farm

Janet & Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the entrance to Mini golf
item.name: Mini golf, Putting Range, Batting Cages, Cows, Ice Cream.....RICHARDSON'S
